availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John S. Ramey (Caldwell County, Ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Ramey and Irena E. Ramey. Married to Susan Ramey. Father of Nancy Ramey, Martha Ramey, Henry Ramey, Ninion Ramey, and Robert Ramey. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Long Pond in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 380B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Long Pond, p. 8.
"John Simon Ramey (1834-1898)," Find A Grave, Memorial #24984490, accessed January 7, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/24984490.
